sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_oe_sfs.VAAdapterCommonMessages</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VAAdapterCommonMessages</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VAAdapterCommonMessages = Class.create();

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getSkip = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("Skip") :
		gs.getMessageLang("Skip", userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getSubmit = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("Submit") :
		gs.getMessageLang("Submit", userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getCancelChat = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("Cancel chat") :
		gs.getMessageLang("Cancel chat", userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getImDone = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("I'm done") :
		gs.getMessageLang("I'm done", userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getShowNMore = function(userLang, n) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("Show {0} more", [n.toString()]) :
		gs.getMessageLang("Show {0} more", userLang, [n.toString()]);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getYouSelected = function(userLang, selection){
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("You selected {0}", [selection]) :
		gs.getMessageLang("You selected {0}", userLang, [selection]);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getAcceptSingleFile = function(userLang) {
	var msg = gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("I can only accept one file.", [selection]) :
		gs.getMessageLang("I can only accept one file.", userLang, [selection]);

	return '(' + msg + ')';
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getInvalidUserInput = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage("Sorry. I didn't understand. Can you please make a selection?") :
		gs.getMessageLang("Sorry. I didn't understand. Can you please make a selection?", userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getChatWithAgent = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage('Chat with an agent') :
		gs.getMessageLang('Chat with an agent', userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getAgentWaitTime = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage('Current wait time is approximately:') :
		gs.getMessageLang('Current wait time is approximately:', userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getAgentRequestCancelled = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage('Your request has been cancelled.') :
		gs.getMessageLang('Your request has been cancelled.', userLang);
};

VAAdapterCommonMessages.getCanceled = function(userLang) {
	return gs.nil(userLang) ?
		gs.getMessage('Canceled') :
		gs.getMessageLang('Canceled', userLang);
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-07-05 20:42:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>25ad498953641110af71ddeeff7b12bb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VAAdapterCommonMessages</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set" source="sn_oe_sfs">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Omni-Experience Standard Feature Set">53b1b0e79761011018b2fa98c253afcc</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_25ad498953641110af71ddeeff7b12bb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-12 18:14:40</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
